Interface TagRepo

    • tagExists

      @Query("select (count(t)> 0) from Tag t where t.name = ?1") boolean tagExists(String tagName)

    • getTheMostlyUsedTag

      @Query(value="select t.id, t.name from orders ors\n inner join gift_certificate_tags gt\n inner join tag t\n where ors.gift_certificate_id = gt.gift_certificate_id\n and t.id = gt.tags_id\n and ors.user_id = (SELECT os.user_id FROM orders os,users us\n WHERE os.user_id = us.id\n GROUP BY os.user_id\n ORDER BY SUM(os.cost) DESC\n LIMIT 0, 1)\ngroup by t.id, t.name\norder by count(t.id) desc\nLIMIT 0, 1", nativeQuery=true) Tag getTheMostlyUsedTag()
      A repository method for getting mostly used tag of user orders with highest sum of orders calling a query from SqlQueries class
      Returns:
      Tag
